body.gatha1: Parisaṅkupatho nāma, gijjhapantho sanantano;
Pitā ca puttaṃ avaca, jānaṃ uccaṃ papātinaṃ;
Pariplavantaṃ pathaviṃ, yadā tāta vijānahi;
body.gathalast: Tato tāta nivattassu, māssu etto paraṃ gami.
Olokayanto vakkaṅgo, pabbatāni vanāni ca.
Sāgarena parikkhittaṃ, cakkaṃva parimaṇḍalaṃ.
Tañca vātasikhā tikkhā, accahāsi baliṃ dijaṃ.
body.gatha1: Nāsakkhātigato poso, punadeva nivattituṃ;
Tassa puttā ca dārā ca, ye caññe anujīvino;
body.gathalast: Sabbe byasanamāpāduṃ, anovādakare dije.
body.gatha1: Evampi idha vuḍḍhānaṃ, yo vākyaṃ nāvabujjhati;
body.gathalast: Sa ve byasanaṃ pappoti, akatvā vuḍḍhasāsananti.
body.gatha1: Puthusaddo samajano, na bālo koci maññatha;
body.gathalast: Saṅghasmiṃ bhijjamānasmiṃ, nāññaṃ bhiyyo amaññaruṃ.
body.gatha1: Parimuṭṭhā paṇḍitābhāsā, vācāgocarabhāṇino;
body.gathalast: Yāvicchanti mukhāyāmaṃ, yena nītā na taṃ vidū.
body.gatha1: Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me;
body.gathalast: Ye ca taṃ upanayhanti, veraṃ tesaṃ na sammati.
body.gatha1: Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me;
body.gathalast: Ye ca taṃ nupanayhanti, veraṃ tesūpasammati.
body.gatha1: Na hi verena verāni, sammantīdha kudācanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Averena ca sammanti, esa dhammo sanantano.
body.gatha1: Pare ca na vijānanti, mayamettha yamāmase;
body.gathalast: Ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
Raṭṭhaṃ vilumpamānānaṃ, tesampi hoti saṅgati;
Kasmā tumhāka no siyā.
body.gatha1: Sace labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃcaraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
body.gathalast: Abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni, careyya tenattamano satīmā.
body.gatha1: No ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃcaraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
body.gathalast: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya, eko care mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
body.gatha1: Ekassa caritaṃ seyyo, natthi bāle sahāyatā;
body.gathalast: Eko care na pāpāni kayirā, appossukko mātaṅgaraññeva nāgoti.
ñatvā dumapphalaccayena (ka.), disodisaṃ yanti tato vihaṅgamā.
body.gatha1: Cara cārikaṃ lohitatuṇḍa māmari, kiṃ tvaṃ suva sukkhadumamhi jhāyasi;
body.gathalast: Tadiṅgha maṃ brūhi vasantasannibha, kasmā suva sukkhadumaṃ na riñcasi.
Khīṇaṃ akhīṇanti na taṃ jahanti, santo sataṃ dhammamanussarantā.
body.gatha1: Sohaṃ sataṃ aññatarosmi haṃsa, ñātī ca me hoti sakhā ca rukkho;
body.gathalast: na sosa (ka.), na esa (syā.).
Sacetaṃ dhammaṃ rocesi, pāsaṃsosi vijānataṃ.
body.gatha1: So te suva varaṃ dammi, pattayāna vihaṅgama;
body.gathalast: Varaṃ varassu vakkaṅga, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
body.gatha1: Varañca me haṃsa bhavaṃ dadeyya, ayañca rukkho punarāyuṃ labhetha;
body.gathalast: So sākhavā phalimā saṃvirūḷho, madhutthiko tiṭṭhatu sobhamāno.
body.gatha1: Taṃ passa samma phalimaṃ uḷāraṃ, sahāva te hotu udumbarena;
body.gathalast: So sākhavā phalimā saṃvirūḷho, madhutthiko tiṭṭhatu sobhamāno.
body.gatha1: Evaṃ sakka sukhī hohi, saha sabbehi ñātibhi;
body.gathalast: Yathāhamajja sukhito, disvāna saphalaṃ dumaṃ.
body.gatha1: Suvassa ca varaṃ datvā, katvāna saphalaṃ dumaṃ;
body.gathalast: Pakkāmi saha bhariyāya, devānaṃ nandanaṃ vananti.
body.gatha1: Phalassa upabhuñjimhā, nekavassagaṇe bahū;
body.gathalast: Aphalampi viditvāna, sāva metti yathā pure.
body.gatha1: Sukhañca rukkhaṃ koḷāpaṃ, opattamaphalaṃ dumaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ohāya sakuṇā yanti, kiṃ dosaṃ passase dija.
body.gatha1: Ye phalatthā sambhajanti, aphaloti jahanti naṃ;
body.gathalast: Attatthapaññā dummedhā, te honti pakkhapātino.
body.gatha1: Sādhu sakkhi kataṃ hoti, metti saṃsati santhavo;
body.gathalast: Sacetaṃ dhammaṃ rocesi, pāsaṃsosi vijānataṃ.
body.gatha1: So te suva varaṃ dammi, pattayāna vihaṅgama;
body.gathalast: Varaṃ varassu vakkaṅga, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
Daliddova nidhi laddhā, nandeyyāhaṃ punappunaṃ.
body.gatha1: Tato amatamādāya, abhisiñci mahīruhaṃ;
body.gathalast: virūḷhassa (ka.), sītacchāyā manoramā.
body.gatha1: Evaṃ sakka sukhī hohi, saha sabbehi ñātibhi;
body.gathalast: Yathāhamajja sukhito, disvāna saphalaṃ dumaṃ.
body.gatha1: Suvassa ca varaṃ datvā, katvāna saphalaṃ dumaṃ;
body.gathalast: Pakkāmi saha bhariyāya, devānaṃ nandanaṃ vananti.
body.gatha1: Sutaṃ metaṃ mahābrahme, kāme bhuñjati hārito;
body.paragraph: Kaccetaṃ vacanaṃ tucchaṃ, kacci suddho iriyyasi.
body.gatha1: Evametaṃ mahārāja, yathā te vacanaṃ sutaṃ;
body.gathalast: Kummaggaṃ paṭipannosmi, mohaneyyesu mucchito.
Yāya uppatitaṃ rāgaṃ, kiṃ mano na vinodaye.
body.gatha1: Cattārome mahārāja, loke atibalā bhusā;
body.gathalast: Rāgo doso mado moho, yattha paññā na gādhati.
body.gatha1: Arahā sīlasampanno, suddho carati hārito;
body.gathalast: Medhāvī paṇḍito ceva, iti no sammato bhavaṃ.
body.gatha1: Medhāvīnampi hiṃsanti, isiṃ dhammaguṇe rataṃ;
body.gathalast: Vitakkā pāpakā rāja, subhā rāgūpasaṃhitā.
body.gatha1: Uppannāyaṃ sarīrajo, rāgo vaṇṇavidūsano tava;
body.gathalast: Taṃ pajaha bhaddamatthu te, bahunnāsi medhāvisammato.
body.gatha1: karaṇe (sī. syā. pī.)kāme, bahudukkhe mahāvise;
body.gathalast: Tesaṃ mūlaṃ gavesissaṃ, checchaṃ rāgaṃ sabandhanaṃ.
body.gatha1: Idaṃ vatvāna hārito, isi saccaparakkamo;
body.gathalast: Kāmarāgaṃ virājetvā, brahmalokūpago ahūti.
body.gatha1: Yena siñcanti dukkhitaṃ, yena siñcanti āturaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tassa majjhe marissāmi, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yattha bījāni rūhanti, sattā yattha patiṭṭhitā;
body.gathalast: Sā me sīsaṃ nipīḷeti, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yena bhattāni paccanti, sītaṃ yena vihaññati;
body.gathalast: So maṃ bhutto byāpādeti, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ.
body.gatha1: Gimhānaṃ pacchime māse, vātamicchanti paṇḍitā;
Yaṃ nissitā jagatiruhaṃ, svāyaṃ aggiṃ pamuñcati;
body.gathalast: Disā bhajatha vakkaṅgā, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yamānayiṃ somanassaṃ, māliniṃ candanussadaṃ;
Yena jātena nandissaṃ, yassa ca bhavamicchisaṃ;
Suṇantu me jānapadā, negamā ca samāgatā;
body.gathalast: Yatodakaṃ tadādittaṃ, yato khemaṃ tato bhayaṃ.
body.gatha1: Rājā vilumpate raṭṭhaṃ, brāhmaṇo ca purohito;
body.gathalast: Attaguttā viharatha, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayanti.
body.gatha1: Assa indasamo rāja, accantaṃ ajarāmaro;
body.gathalast: Sace tvaṃ yaññaṃ yājeyya, isiṃ lomasakassapaṃ.
body.gatha1: Sasamuddapariyāyaṃ, mahiṃ sāgarakuṇḍalaṃ;
body.gathalast: sayha (sī. syā. pī.)vijānahi.
body.gatha1: Dhiratthu taṃ yasalābhaṃ, dhanalābhañca brāhmaṇa;
body.gathalast: Yā vutti vinipātena, adhammacaraṇena vā.
body.gatha1: Api ce pattamādāya, anagāro paribbaje;
body.gathalast: Sāyeva jīvikā seyyo, yā cādhammena esanā.
body.gatha1: Api ce pattamādāya, anagāro paribbaje;
body.gathalast: Aññaṃ ahiṃsayaṃ loke, api rajjena taṃ varaṃ.
body.gatha1: Balaṃ cando balaṃ suriyo, balaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇā;
body.gathalast: Balaṃ velā samuddassa, balātibalamitthiyo.
body.gatha1: Yathā uggatapaṃ santaṃ, isiṃ lomasakassapaṃ;
Taṃ lobhapakataṃ kammaṃ, kaṭukaṃ kāmahetukaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tassa mūlaṃ gavesissaṃ, checchaṃ rāgaṃ sabandhanaṃ.
body.gatha1: Dhiratthu kāme subahūpi loke, tapova seyyo kāmaguṇehi rāja;
body.gathalast: Tapo karissāmi pahāya kāme, taveva raṭṭhaṃ candavatī ca hotūti.
Kaṃ aṇḍajaṃ aṇḍajā mānusesu, jātiṃ pasaṃsanti tadiṅgha brūtha.
body.gatha1: Kiṃ aṇṇave kāni phalāni bhuñje, maṃsaṃ kuto khādatha cakkavākā;
Na aṇṇave santi phalāni dhaṅka, maṃsaṃ kuto khādituṃ cakkavāke;
Na me idaṃ ruccati cakkavāka, asmiṃ bhave bhojanasannikāso;
body.gathalast: Ahosi pubbe tato me aññathā, icceva me vimati ettha jātā.
body.gatha1: Ahampi maṃsāni phalāni bhuñje, annāni ca loṇiyateliyāni;
body.gatha2: Rasaṃ manussesu labhāmi bhottuṃ, sūrova saṅgāmamukhaṃ vijetvā;
body.gathalast: Na ca me tādiso vaṇṇo, cakkavāka yathā tava.
body.gatha1: Asuddhabhakkhosi khaṇānupātī, kicchena te labbhati annapānaṃ;
body.gathalast: Na tussasī rukkhaphalehi dhaṅka, maṃsāni vā yāni susānamajjhe.
body.gatha1: Yo sāhasena adhigamma bhoge, paribhuñjati dhaṅka khaṇānupātī;
body.gathalast: Tato upakkosati naṃ sabhāvo, upakkuṭṭho vaṇṇabalaṃ jahāti.
body.gatha1: asāhasenānupaghātino (ka.);
body.gathalast: Balañca vaṇṇo ca tadassa hoti, na hi sabbo āhāramayena vaṇṇoti.
body.gatha1: Sutitikkhaṃ araññamhi, pantamhi sayanāsane;
body.gathalast: Ye ca gāme titikkhanti, te uḷāratarā tayā.
body.gatha1: Araññā gāmamāgamma, kiṃsīlaṃ kiṃvataṃ ahaṃ;
body.gathalast: Purisaṃ tāta seveyyaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito.
Sussūsī ca titikkhī ca, taṃ bhajehi ito gato.
body.gatha1: Yassa kāyena vācāya, manasā natthi dukkaṭaṃ;
body.gathalast: Urasīva patiṭṭhāya, taṃ bhajehi ito gato.
body.gatha1: Yo ca dhammena carati, carantopi na maññati;
body.gathalast: Visuddhakāriṃ sappaññaṃ, taṃ bhajehi ito gato.
body.gatha1: Haliddirāgaṃ kapicittaṃ, purisaṃ rāgavirāginaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tādisaṃ tāta mā sevi, nimmanussampi ce siyā.
body.gatha1: Āsīvisaṃva kupitaṃ, mīḷhalittaṃ mahāpathaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ārakā parivajjehi, yānīva visamaṃ pathaṃ.
body.gatha1: Anatthā tāta vaḍḍhanti, bālaṃ accupasevato;
body.gathalast: Māssu bālena saṃgacchi, amitteneva sabbadā.
body.gatha1: Taṃ tāhaṃ tāta yācāmi, karassu vacanaṃ mama;
body.gathalast: Kaccittha bhonto kusalaṃ anāmayaṃ, cirassamabbhāgamanaṃ hi vo idha.
body.gatha1: Ahameva eko idha majja patto, na cāpi me dutiyo koci vijjati;
body.gathalast: Kimeva sandhāya te bhāsitaṃ ise, ‘‘kuto nu āgacchatha bho tayo janā’’.
body.gatha1: Tuvañca eko bhariyā ca te piyā, samuggapakkhittanikiṇṇamantare ;
body.gathalast: Addakkhi bhariyaṃ suci māladhāriniṃ, vāyussa puttena sahā tahiṃ rataṃ.
Yathā have pāṇarivettha rakkhitā, duṭṭhā mayī aññamabhippamodayi.
body.gatha1: Divā ca ratto ca mayā upaṭṭhitā, tapassinā jotirivā vane vasaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sā dhammamukkamma adhammamācari, akiriyarūpo pamadāhi santhavo.
body.gatha1: Sarīramajjhamhi ṭhitātimaññahaṃ, mayhaṃ ayanti asatiṃ asaññataṃ;
body.gathalast: Sā dhammamukkamma adhammamācari, akiriyarūpo pamadāhi santhavo.
Etā hi pātālapapātasannibhā, etthappamatto byasanaṃ nigacchati.
body.gatha1: Tasmā hi te sukhino vītasokā, ye mātugāmehi caranti nissaṭā;
body.gathalast: Etaṃ sivaṃ uttamamābhipatthayaṃ, na mātugāmehi kareyya santhavanti.
body.gatha1: Na kho me ruccati āḷi, pūtimaṃsassa pekkhanā;
body.gathalast: Etādisā sakhārasmā, ārakā parivajjaye.
body.gatha1: Ummattikā ayaṃ veṇī, vaṇṇeti patino sakhiṃ;
Tvaṃ khosi samma ummatto, dummedho avicakkhaṇo;
Na akāle vipekkheyya, kāle pekkheyya paṇḍito;
Piyaṃ kho āḷi me hotu, puṇṇapattaṃ dadāhi me;
body.gathalast: pucchitā (syā. ka.).
body.gatha1: Piyaṃ kho āḷi te hotu, puṇṇapattaṃ dadāmi te;
Kīdiso tuyhaṃ parivāro, yesaṃ kāhāmi bhojanaṃ;
body.gathalast: te (sī. syā. pī.)me akkhāhi pucchitā.
body.gatha1: Māliyo caturakkho ca, piṅgiyo atha jambuko;
Nikkhantāya agārasmā, bhaṇḍakampi vinassati;
Yo te puttake akhādi, dinnabhatto adūsake;
body.gathalast: Tasmiṃ dāṭhaṃ nipātehi, mā te muccittha jīvato.
body.gatha1: Ākiṇṇaluddo puriso, dhāticelaṃva makkhito;
body.gathalast: Padesaṃ taṃ na passāmi, yattha dāṭhaṃ nipātaye.
body.gatha1: Akataññussa posassa, niccaṃ vivaradassino;
body.gathalast: Sabbaṃ ce pathaviṃ dajjā, neva naṃ abhirādhaye.
body.gatha1: Kinnu subāhu taramānarūpo, paccāgatosi saha māṇavena;
body.gathalast: Kiṃ kiccamatthaṃ idhamatthi tuyhaṃ, akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo te sakhā daddaro sādhurūpo, tassa vadhaṃ parisaṅkāmi ajja;
body.gathalast: Purisassa kammāyatanāni sutvā, nāhaṃ sukhiṃ daddaraṃ ajja maññe.
body.gatha1: Kānissa kammāyatanāni assu, purisassa vuttisamodhānatāya;
body.gathalast: Kaṃ vā paṭiññaṃ purisassa sutvā, parisaṅkasi daddaraṃ māṇavena.
body.gatha1: Ciṇṇā kaliṅgā caritā vaṇijjā, vettācaro saṅkupathopi ciṇṇo;
Tānissa kammāyatanāni assu, purisassa vuttisamodhānatāya;
body.gathalast: Yathā ayaṃ dissati lomapiṇḍo, gāvo hatā kiṃ pana daddarassāti.
body.gatha1: Varagijjha samajjana haṃsavaro, nidhisavhaya hārita pāṭaliko;
body.gathalast: Ajarāmara dhaṅka titikkha kuto, atha dvādasa pekkhana daddaribhīti.
